messages.msgSnippet: Hi, The following make me think of long ago when I read or heard John Holt tell us as homeschooling parents to lead an interesting life, and let our children
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

The following make me think of long ago when I read or heard John Holt tell
us as homeschooling parents to lead an interesting life, and let our children
be a part of it. I have found that as the children get older, they then let
me be a part of their interesting lives - I've gotten to see and do things
with them that never would have occured to me.

Connie colten


> They sometimes seem to
> expect that they can throw the curriculum out the window and then they get
> to
> focus only on their OWN interests and let the children fend for themselves.
> And certainly our detractors act like that is what they think we're doing.
>
>




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
